column5: "Emi nye EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn a miyii wo wɔ Egypt asaase do

column2: "Mma nnya enyame fofor nnka mo ho."

column3: anaa adze a ɔwɔ wimu wɔ sor
column4: anaa dza ɔwɔ asaase do wɔ famu
column5: anaa dza ɔwɔ nsu mu wɔ asaase ase

column2: "mma mmbɔ wo mu adze mma hɔn
column3: na nnsom hɔn: na emi EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn meyɛ Nyame nyinkufo a medze egyanom hɔn emumuyɛ bɔhwɛ mba
column4: ekodu ebusuasantsen ebiasa nye anan a wɔtan me do;"

column2: "na muhu mpempem a wɔdɔ me na wodzi me mbransɛm do mbɔbɔr."
"Mma mmbɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dzin gyangyan
column3: na EWURADZE nnkɛma nyia no a ɔbɔ ne dzin gyangyan afa noho tɔtrɔtɔ."

column2: "Kaa ahomgyeda no na sie no krɔnkrɔn."
"na da a otsia esuon no yɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ahomgyeda: mma nnyɛ edwuma biara wɔ mu
column9: wo hɔho a ɔwɔ wo kuropon mu o:"

column2: "na nda esia na EWURADZE bɔɔ sor nye asaase
column5: na ɔhoom da a otsia esuon no: dɛm ntsi na EWURADZE hyiraa ahomgyeda no

column2: "Dzi w'egya nye wo na nyi: ama wo nda aawar wɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no do."

column8: anaa biribiara a ɔyɛ wo nyɛnko dze."

column2: "Na aber a ɔman no nyinara hun asenaman no
column4: nye bepɔw a orupun wusiw no
na yebetsie: na mma Nyankopɔn nnye hɛn nnkasa

column3: Mma hom nnsuro: na Nyankopɔn aba dɛ ɔrobɔsɔ hom ahwɛ
column4: ama no ho suro aaba hom enyi do

column3: na Moses twee bɛɛn sum kadoo no mbrɛ Nyankopɔn wɔ no."

column4: Homara hom ehu dɛ mifi ɔsor na menye hom akasa."

column2: "Mma hom nnyɛ me saso enyame bi mma hom ho; dwetɛ enyame

column6: nye w'anantwi no bɔ do afɔr: beebiara a mebɛma wɔakaa me dzin no
column7: mebɛba wo nkyɛn na mebehyira wo."

column2: "Na sɛ ereyɛ abo afɔrmbukyia ama me: mma mmfa abo a woetwa nnsia osiandɛ sɛ ema w'edwindadze do bɔ do a
"Nkyii so mma mmfow atwer nnkɔ afɔrmbukyia do
column3: amma w'adagyaw aannda edzi wɔ do."
